about.details:
Established on 2012, Safa Systems & Technologies is engaged in the business of distributorship of consumer durable products like Mobile phones, Mobile phone accessories, Tablets, LED TVs, Home appliances and wearable devises of various brands like Xiaomi, OPPO, TECNO, Micromax, One Plus in Kerala. The company works in B2B (Business to Business) model.

The company has strict quality regulations and has been also awarded with ISO 9001:2015 quality certifications. Recently, the company has taken an office in Mumbai as a part of its expansion plans to grow their presence into other regions of the country.

Competitive Strengths:

  • Organizational stability along with management expertise
  • Established relationship with customers and suppliers
  • Strong supplier relationship ensuring the right supply and pricing of the products
  • Quality & ISO Certifications

faqs.question: What is the Safa Systems IPO?
faqs.answer:
Safa Systems IPO is a SME IPO of 4000000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹4.00 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹10 per share. The minimum order quantity is 10000.

The IPO opens on January 28, 2022, and closes on February 1, 2022.

Cameo Corporate Services Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Safa Systems IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Safa Systems IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Safa Systems IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Safa Systems IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Safa Systems IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Safa Systems IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Safa Systems IPO opens on January 28, 2022 and closes on February 1, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Safa Systems IPO?
faqs.answer: Safa Systems IPO lot size is 10000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,00,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Safa Systems IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Safa Systems IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Safa Systems IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Safa Systems IPO will be done on Friday, February 4, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, February 8, 2022. Check the Safa Systems IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Safa Systems IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Safa Systems IPO listing date is on Wednesday, February 9, 2022.
